pl-nk v0.4.5
Plonk|Plink|Plank are a set of cross-platform C/C++ frameworks for audio software development

00777 /* Creating a new iOS Project
00778  
00779  - In Xcode -> Preferences -> Source trees add a PL_NK_SOURCE tree to point to the pl-nk /src folder
00780  - Create a project using any of the iOS templates in Xcode.
00781  - change all .m files to .mm (Objective-C++)
00782  - add the /src folder to the project/target (selecting don't copy files)
00783  - change this to be "relative to PL_NK_SOURCE" in the right hand side-bar
00784  - add $(PL_NK_SOURCE) to the header search paths in the project
00785  - add PLONK_AUDIOHOST_IOS=1 to the preprocessor macros (in all configurations, debug, release etc)
00786  
00787  Then you need an AudioHost class e.g.,:
00788  
00789  @interface AudioHost : PLAudioHost<PLAudioHostDelegate>
00790  @end
00791  
00792  @implementation AudioHost
00793  
00794  - (id)init
00795  {
00796  if (self = [super init])
00797  {
00798  self.delegate = self; // set which class contains the constructGraph method
00799  }
00800  
00801  return self;
00802  }
00803  
00804  - (Unit)constructGraphFloat:(PLAudioHost*)host
00805  {
00806  return Sine::ar (1000, 0.1);
00807  }
00808  
00809  @end
00810 
00811  Finally you need to make one of these in the AppDelegate (or the main ViewController for single view apps would be OK):
00812  
00813  e.g.,:
00814  
00815  @interface AppDelegate : UIResponder <UIApplicationDelegate>
00816  
00817  @property (strong, nonatomic) UIWindow *window;
00818  @property (strong, nonatomic) AudioHost *host;
00819  
00820  @end
00821 
00822  - (BOOL)application:(UIApplication *)application didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:(NSDictionary *)launchOptions
00823  {
00824  _host = [[AudioHost alloc] init];
00825  [_host startHost];
00826  
00827  return YES;
00828  }
00829 
00830  
00831 
00832  */
00833
